name: Liz and Marilyn Movies Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: In 'A Place in the Sun', the romance betwen Liz and Montgomery Clift is blocked by Clift's relationship with another woman. Who is she?
Speaking of Montgomery Clift, Liz starred with him in this romantic drama.
options: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
questions.explanation:
Raintree County.

	Not a good movie

questions.text: In 'Ivanhoe', young Liz is the object of this villainous knight's unwanted affections.
questions.explanation:
George Sanders.

	Good {movie;} good role for all the key players.

questions.text: Liz was married to Eddie Fisher for a while. In which movie did he co-star with her?
Marilyn had a hit in 'the Seven Year Itch'. Who was her co-star?
questions.explanation:
Tom Ewell.

	Matthau was considered for the part

questions.text: Marilyn had a small, early role in 'The Asphalt Jungle'. Who was one of the male leads?
Who were Marilyn's co-stars in 'How To Marry A Millionaire?
questions.explanation:
Betty Grable and Lauren Bacall.

	Slight comedy

questions.text: Marilyn did a western: 'River of No Return'. Who was her male co-star?
questions.explanation:
Robert Mitchum.

	The others were co-stars in some of her other movies
